comments:
Dr. Kroll not only received positive reviews from every evaluator, but almost all of them were extremely enthusiastic in their praise of him. Adjectives used to describe Dr. Kroll ranged from “knowledgeable” and “patient” to “incredible,” “great,” “the best,” and “freakin’ sweet.” Students felt the material covered was interesting, and more than one student remarked that it was the most fun class they have ever taken.
*Note: More than 70% of students submitted written evaluations for this class
